title: Setup EXTRA
content:
### changing keymap:
```
xmodmap -e "keycode 65 = space space space space"
```
```
xmodmap -e "keysym ISO_Level3_Shift = Menu"
```
```
xmodmap -e "keycode 97 = underscore backslash"
xmodmap -e "keycode 20 = equal minus"
xmodmap -e "keycode 10 = exclam 1"
xmodmap -e "keycode 11 = quotedbl 2"
xmodmap -e "keycode 12 = numbersign 3"
xmodmap -e "keycode 13 = dollar 4"
xmodmap -e "keycode 14 = percent 5"
xmodmap -e "keycode 15 = ampersand 6"
xmodmap -e "keycode 16 = apostrophe 7"
xmodmap -e "keycode 17 = parenleft 8"
xmodmap -e "keycode 18 = parenright 9"
xmodmap -e "keycode 132 = bar yen"
xmodmap -e "keycode 34 = grave at"
xmodmap -e "keycode 35 = braceleft bracketleft"
xmodmap -e "keycode 51 = braceright bracketright"
```
<hr>

### check fingerprint of apk package:
```
keytool -printcert -jarfile file.apk
```

<hr>

Change icon

```
sudo gedit /usr/share/applications/codium.desktop
```
`Icon=/home/fitored/Public/Icon/js.png`

<hr>

Suspend Delay

```
gsettings set org.gnome.settings-daemon.plugins.power sleep-inactive-ac-timeout 200
gsettings set org.gnome.settings-daemon.plugins.power sleep-inactive-battery-timeout 200
```
`put time in seconds`

<hr>

GRUB

```
sudo gedit /etc/default/grub
```
```
GRUB_DEFAULT=saved
GRUB_SAVEDEFAULT=true
GRUB_TIMEOUT=1
GRUB_TIMEOUT_STYLE=hidden
#GRUB_HIDDEN_TIMEOUT=0
GRUB_TIMEOUT_STYLE=countdown
GRUB_HIDDEN_TIMEOUT_QUIET=true
```
```
sudo update-grub
```

<hr>

```
sudo gedit /etc/fstab
```

`UUID=xxxx / ext4 noatime,errors=remount-ro 0 1`

<hr>
